text: Dueling DQN (DDQN) N * Decompose Q(s,a) Q(s,a) = A(s,a) + V(s) * V(s): the value of being at that state * A(s,a): the of taking action a in state s versus all other possible actions at that state * Use two streams: * one that estimates the stat V/(s) * one that estimates the ) Â» Useful for states where action choice does not affect Q(s,a) il e e [336] https://deeplearning.mit.edu 2019
